description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Coles Bay, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Tasmania Waterside Luxury: Freycinet National Park Lodge with Daily Breakfast & A$100 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Discover Tasmania's wild east coast with a stay within Freycinet National Park, where rugged bushland meets the sweeping sands of Richardson's Beach. Wake to panoramic views of the Hazards mountains and Great Oyster Bay, with direct access to untouched shoreline and coastal walking trails steps from your door. With daily breakfast taken care of and additional dining credit to use across any onsite restaurant, you'll be spoiled for choice of culinary delights. Savour local seafood at Richardson's Bistro, indulge in fine-dining as you watch the crashing waves from The Bay Restaurant, or enjoy a pint of local Tasmanian beer or a cocktail at Hazards Bar & Lounge. For the adventurous, the lodge's own company, Freycinet Adventures, offers thrilling experiences from sea kayaking to e-biking through the wilderness. A short stroll leads to the renowned Wineglass Bay, or should you wish to stay closer to home, wander to the Lodge's picturesque deck to enjoy a glass of bubbles and fresh Tasmanian oysters as you watch the sunset over the bay's pristine waters.

hotels.title: Tasmania Wilderness Retreat in Coles Bay near Freycinet National Park
hotels.description: Secluded in the rugged wilderness of Tasmania's East Coast, Freycinet Resort offers unparalleled access to the stunning Freycinet National Park, home to the iconic Wineglass Bay. Indulge in the region's freshest seafood at the acclaimed Marine Farm, or sample award-winning wines at the nearby Devil's Corner Cellar Door. After a day of exploration, retreat to your private cabin, where floor-to-ceiling windows offer breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape.

seo.title: Hotel a Coles Bay - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Coles Bay, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
